text: Kana kuti vanoti: “Iye (Muhammad (SAW)) akazvigadzirira!” Iti: “Kana ndakazvigadzirira, nazvino hamuna kana simba rekundibetsera kubva kuna Allah. Ivo (Allah) vanoziva chaizvo zvamunotaura pakati penyu maererano nezvaro (Qur’aan)! Vakakwana semupupuri pakati pangu nemi! Uye ndivo vanoregerera, vane nyasha zhinji.”
